name: Gambit!
summary:
Alright, we can do this in two ways. 

We can tell you about a story rich 4-player co-op campaign, the Municipal Mayhem™, dozens of guns, a myriad of attachments, skins, masks, deathmatch, tournament ladders, minigames, leaderboards, climbing, graffiti, hidden rewards, the GNOP, bossfights, free updates, dedicated customer support, and so on. 

Or, we can tell you what it’s really about: 

Jaguar blood, gunpowder pheromone, treasure chest musk, gun oil bite, winning lottery ticket crumple, last bullet...
